attributes.action: act against the planned destruction of a Eastwood House, March, Cambs on the grounds of it being of historical and social importance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: News has broken that the plans for the modernised Neale Wade Community College include the removal of a Georgian House located on the grounds and currently included in the school site. The house has been for many the first thing they see upon arrival at the Neale Wade, passing it on the road and for many has been a huge part of March town. Now it is proposed that the building be removed and replaced with 21st century detritus. We the undersigned ask the Prime Minister to stop this atrocity!
